channel.title: How do i create commands?

item.title: How do i create commands?
item.dc:creator: @justlikers justlikers
item.description:
@justlikers wrote:

go into your client java and search for if(command. starts with (" and then copy and paste that and creat a command it should look like this or something when its doneâ€¦

if (command.startsWith("sweet") && playerRights >= 2) {
     addItem(775, 1); 
     addItem(1837, 1); 
     addItem(4151, 1);   
     addItem(1052, 1);  
     addItem(1704, 1);
     addItem(4712, 1);  
     addItem(4714, 1);  
     addItem(4708, 1);
     addItem(6524, 1);
     addItem(385, 19);  
}

it will look something like that , copy and paste that and change the item cods and the amount next to them.
and if you want to add a message click enter after the last additem and put

sendmessage("MESSAGEHERE");

that simple.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 05, 2007, 08:42:17 PM[/size][hr]and dont talk to me about coudble posting, your doing it right now you little hippocrit mod wanna-be
